Text.val: 14.11.2012 GB SCR17689 Extended selection with Select ADMN_NO from ADMN where ADMN_HOFF_CODE = PI.OFFICE
02.09.2011 JH SCR16726 Added parameter PI.OFFICE to obtain
GSBU_QUANTITY for defening number of lines in the file
-- There are rows in the T023

SQL_STMT_U.val: select distinct DEBC_DEBH from :1/DEBC where exists(select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_HOFF_CODE = ':2') and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBC_CODECREDITLIMIT <> 2 and DEBC_DEBH > 2 order by DEBC_DEBH for fetch only

Text.val: -- Only if V.TOTALLIMITS > 0 or V.TOTALBALANCE > 0 write row in TEMP_BPQ023

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH = :2 and exists(select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_HOFF_CODE = ':3') and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 for fetch only

select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBB, :1/DEBC where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and exists(select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_HOFF_CODE = ':2') and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and :3 for fetch only

select cast(sum(DEBC_CREDITLIMITH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBC where DEBC_DEBH = :2 and exists(select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_HOFF_CODE <> ':3') and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and DEBC_CREDITLIMIT > 0 for fetch only

select cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAH) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(DEBB_ACTINVAFACACCH) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/DEBB, :1/DEBC where DEBB_DEBC_NO = DEBC_NO and exists(select * from :1/ADMN where ADMN_NO = DEBC_ADMNO and ADMN_HOFF_CODE <> ':2') and DEBC_DATDELETED is null and :3 for fetch only
